titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide certain qualifications pertaining to service as a Member, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add a rule prohibiting a Member from serving any term or portion thereof if the Member has served for each of the six immediately preceding terms commencing after 1992. Requires a recorded vote to amend or revise such rule.
